original_title: Special programme to grant rupee appreciation benefit directly to people: Siyambalapitiya
original_body_lines: The government is implementing a special programme to grant the benefit of the appreciation of the rupee against the dollar to the people, Finance State Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said.

While addressing a meeting in Ruwanwella this morning, he said since 75% of the goods in the country's market are imported, when the value of the dollar decreases, the prices of those goods too should decrease within a reasonable period of time.
In order to carry out a survey on this matter, the Trade and Policy Department of the Finance Ministry is conducting a survey together with the Consumer Affairs Authority.
If the prices of building materials, food and materials and equipment related to the agriculture industry do not decrease, measures should be taken to rectify this.
Also, prices of other essential goods, including school equipment, should be reduced, he added. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
